What are you struggling with and how can: Ma 'xiex qed tissara u kif nistgħu ngħinu?
How did you put into practice the script: Kif poġġejt fil-prattika l-Iskrittura / storja li studjajna l-aħħar darba li ltqajna?
Who did you share last week's lesson wit: Ma 'min qsamt il-lezzjoni tal-ġimgħa li għaddiet u kif marret?
What needs did you meet in the community: X’teħtieġ iltqajt fil-komunità l-ġimgħa li għaddiet?
Ask someone to read the passage one para: Staqsi lil xi ħadd biex jaqra s-silta paragrafu wieħed kull darba.
Have a group member tell it in their own: Ikollhom membru tal-grupp jgħidlu fi kliemhom.
Ask the group if they added anything or: Staqsi lill-grupp jekk żiedu xejn jew ħallew xi ħaġa barra.
When you finish with ALL paragraphs, ask: Meta tispiċċa bil-paragrafi kollha, staqsi lil xi ħadd fil-grupp biex jgħid l-istorja kollha bil-memorja. Ikollok il-grupp jikkoreġi kwalunkwe żball.
What does this passage tell us about God: Xi tgħidilna din is-silta dwar Alla?
What does this passage tell us about peo: Xi tgħidilna din is-silta dwar in-nies?
If this passage is true, what behaviour: Jekk din is-silta hija vera, liema mġieba għandna nibdlu din il-ġimgħa?
Who will you tell this story to this wee: Min se tgħid din l-istorja għal din il-ġimgħa?
What needs can we meet in the community: X'teħtieġ nistgħu niltaqgħu fil-komunità din il-ġimgħa?
Would you like to discover with your fri: Tixtieq tiskopri ma 'sħabek kif Alla hu u kif Alla jrid li tgħix?
Here are some questions to get your disc: Hawn xi mistoqsijiet biex tibda d-diskussjoni tiegħek.
Would you like to discover for yourself: Tixtieq tiskopri għalik innifsek kif inhu Alla u kif Alla jrid li tgħix?
Most people like to make these discoveri: Ħafna nies jħobbu jagħmlu dawn l-iskoperti fi grupp ma 'sħabhom.
